Posts.Content: Thank you ladies ive actually had a really good weekend, spoke to my hubby and a clise fiend and i feel alot more positive now. Just another blip on the rollercoaster of life. I will update as to what happens tomorrow. X
Posts.Title: Diagnosis of my breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies ive actually had a really good weekend, spoke to my hubby and a close friend and i feel alot more positive now. Just another blip on the rollercoaster of life. I will update as to what happens tomorrow. X
Posts.Title: Diagnosis of my breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you lovely ladies for taking the time to reply to me and offer comfort and advise. I was seen at the breast screening clinic yesterday and everything is absolutely fine. I have lumpy boobs and menopausal pain been advised to have annual mammograms but all ok. I am extremely grateful for everybodys patience and understanding and wish you all well on your journeys xxx
Posts.Title: Diagnosis of my breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you for your kind words .. i didnt seem to get stressed with my melanoma because i really didnt believe it was anything to worry about when i got my referral then i was shocked when i got my diagnosis but it was dealt with really quickly i just got on with it .. but this seems to have really rattled me somehow, im feeling quite tearful when im on my own. In front of my hubby and kids its business as usual, especially at this time of year but to be honest im struggling so its an early night for me as its my boys birthday tomorrow and i need to be positive x
Posts.Title: Diagnosis of my breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you for your kind words .. i didnt seem to get stressed with my melanoma because i really didnt believe it was anything to worry about when i got my referral then i was shocked when i got my diagnosis but it was dealt with really quickly i just got on with it .. but this seems to have really rattled me somehow, im feeling quite tearful when im on my own. Posts.Title: Diagnosis of my breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Hi  Thank you for sharing .. I had a malignant melanoma sucessfully removed from my right upper arm 12 months ago I have been having breast / armpit pain in my right breast for 3 months a dull ache which is constantly there and more sensitive if i lie on it or my bra seems to aggrevate it too sometimes. I have been referred to the breast screening clinic i go on tuesdsy 18th .. im trying not to worry and  fingers crossed but atleast im being pro active and not ignoring it . I hope you get your results soon and good luck with your treatment  x
Posts.Title: Diagnosis of my breast cancer.
